product-name: IFB 6 Kg 5 Star AI Powered Fully Automatic Front Load Washing Machine 2X Power Steam (DIVA AQUA GBS 6010, 2023 Model, Grey, In-built Heater, 4 years Comprehensive Warranty)
about: Fully-automatic Front load washing machine: Best Wash Quality, Energy and Water efficient. Capacity 6 Kg: Suitable for 3 – 4 members Powered By AI : A neural network-based algorithm detects fabric type and weight. It then optimises the wash—duration, water level, wash actions and the level of gentleness needed. Energy Rating 5 Star: Best in class efficiency TRISHIELD PROTECTION : IFB washers come with India's best warranty 4 years machine warranty + 10 years Motor Warranty + 10 years Spares Support 1000 RPM: higher spin speeds helps in faster drying 8 Wash Programmes: Mixed/Daily, Cotton Normal, Cradle Wash for Delicates, Woollens, Cotton Eco Plus, Express Wash/ Express 15, Rins +Spin, Spin Dry/Drain Built with innovative stainless steel crescent moon drum design that creates a gentle water cushion, preventing damage to fabrics & optimally placed holes provide the mechanical action required to get the desired wash results. Key Features: 2X Power Steam Cycle for Power Cleaning, Aqua Energie Device for Water Softening, Better Detergent Action & Color Protection, Cradle Wash for Delicates, Time Saver: Saves Water, Power, Detergent & Time, Laundry Add, Quick Express Wash Inbuilt Heater Temperature Range: Hot, Warm, Cold, Self Diagnosis, Program Memory Back up, Child Lock, High-Low Voltage Protection, Auto Imbalance Control, Protective Rat Mesh, Foam Detection, Auto Restart, Auto Tub Clean, Anti Rust proof body, Silent Operation

reviews.title: excellent

reviews.title: Good product
reviews.body: This product meets all expectations. Works as expected. No kind of damage was found on the item when it was delivered.

reviews.title: Very bad
reviews.body: I purchased this washing machine with high hopes, but unfortunately, it has been nothing but a headache. It arrived damaged, with dents and scratches. The machine is incredibly noisy and doesn't clean clothes properly. Control panel is confusing, and cycle times are long. Very disappointed.

reviews.title: Quality wise is good
reviews.body: Premium quality. I'm happy with the product.

reviews.title: Disappointing Delivery Experience
reviews.body: Delivery experience was unsatisfactory. The vendor demanded extra cash for the exchange. The whole process felt unprofessional and shady.

reviews.title: No time duration indicator.
reviews.body: It’s surprising that there is no time duration indicator. Also, no separate compartment for freshener.

reviews.title: Unmatched performance
reviews.body: This washing machine is a beast. 'Just bring it on'.

reviews.title: Horrible installation experience
reviews.body: The washing machine is good, but the installation process was a nightmare. I had to call multiple times and deal with pushy installers.

reviews.title: Parts were missing
reviews.body: Screws for fitting the top were missing. Technician brought additional screws after a few days.
